titleStmt.title: A vvord of comfort. Or A discourse concerning the late lamentable accident of the fall of a roome, at a Catholike sermon, in the Black-friars at London, wherwith about fourscore persons were oppressed. Written for the comfort of Catholiks, and information of Protestants, by I.R. p
titleStmt.author: Floyd, John, 1572-1649.

titleStmt.title: A vvord of comfort. Or A discourse concerning the late lamentable accident of the fall of a roome, at a Catholike sermon, in the Black-friars at London, wherwith about fourscore persons were oppressed. Written for the comfort of Catholiks, and information of Protestants, by I.R. p

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Tightly bound; some faded print and some pages stained.
